arts.ttl: Everton, be warned: Liverpool is taking a run of late winners into the Merseyside derby
arts.sum: Arne Slot’s Liverpool, the defending Premier League champion, is making an uncanny habit of scoring late winning goals to start this season. The only points Arsenal has dropped so far were in a 1-0 loss at Liverpool — secured by, fittingly, a late free kick from Dominik Szoboszlai — while City is coming off a 3-0 victory over Manchester United in the derby last weekend.
